import datetime
import os

currentDateTime = datetime.datetime.now()
date = currentDateTime.date()
year = date.strftime("%Y")
month = date.strftime("%m")
day = date.strftime("%d")
time = date.strftime("%H:%M:%S")
date_time = date.strftime("%m/%d/%Y, %H:%M:%S")

locationCursoCenso = "abfss://silver@dataexjh77rhzzkvukipoc.dfs.core.windows.net/3caracoes/KNA1/*.parquet"
#location = "abfss://bronze@dataexjh77rhzzkvukipoc.dfs.core.windows.net/3caracoes/KNA1/KNA1/2022/03/08/*.parquet

df = spark.read.load(locationCursoCenso, format='parquet')
print(df.count())

#df2 = spark.createDataFrame(df.select('uf', 'cod_uf' , 'cod_mun', 'nome_mun', 'populacao').distinct().collect())
print(df.count())

path = "abfss://gold@dataexjh77rhzzkvukipoc.dfs.core.windows.net/3caracoes/KNA1/"
df.write.mode('overwrite').parquet(path)
